Retrieves the factory to create request authentication credentials.

get

void get(java.net.URI uri,
         org.mobicents.xcap.client.auth.Credentials credentials)
         throws java.io.IOException
Retrieves the XML resource from the XCAP server, for the specified uri. Response is async.

Parameters:
uri - the request uri
credentials - authentication credentials, can be null for requests that don't need authentication.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

get

         java.lang.String assertedUserId)
         throws java.io.IOException

Parameters:
uri - the request uri
assertedUserId - user id already authenticated
Throws:
java.io.IOException

put

void put(java.net.URI uri,
         java.lang.String mimetype,
         byte[] content,
         org.mobicents.xcap.client.auth.Credentials credentials)
         throws java.io.IOException
Puts the specified content in the XCAP Server.

Parameters:
uri - the request uri
mimetype - the mimetype of the content to put, for document each XCAP App Usage defines their own mimetype, but for elements and attributes you can use ElementResource and AttributeResource static MIMETYPE fields.
content -
credentials - authentication credentials, can be null for requests that don't need authentication.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

subscribe

void subscribe(java.lang.String subscriber,
               java.lang.String notifier,
               int expires,
               java.lang.String[] resourceURIs)
               throws org.mobicents.slee.enabler.sip.SubscriptionException
Method which triggers subscription to changes in XDMS resources. XCAP DIFF mode used is agreggated.

Parameters:
subscriber - - address that identifies local entity
notifier - - address that identifies the resource being subscribed (ie. XCAP Diff entity), ie. sip:tests@xcap.example.com
expires - - duration of subscription, in seconds.
resourceURIs - - array of resource uris to which enabler will subscribe, ie. String{}[resource-lists/users/sip:joe@example.com/index,rls-services/users/sip:joe@example.com/index/~~/*\/service%5b@uri='sip:marketing@example.com'%5d]
Throws:
org.mobicents.slee.enabler.sip.SubscriptionException

unsubscribe

void unsubscribe(java.lang.String subscriber,
                 java.lang.String notifier)
Terminates a subscription to changes in XDMS resources.

Parameters:
subscriber -
notifier -
